plot: Zuko battles his sister with Katara's help for the right to be named Fire Lord. Elsewhere, Aang meets Ozai just as the comet arrives.

As Sozin's Comet burns through the sky, everyone goes to meet their appointed destinies. Zuko and Katara return to the Fire Nation to face Azula. Toph, Sokka, and Suki try to sabotage the Fire Nation's airship fleet. And Aang stands ready to face Ozai.—Taigan

Zuko challenges his sister to an Agni Kai battle for the fate of the Fire Nation and the crown, Zuko immediately outmatches Azula. However, Zuko is seriously injured when Azula tries to kill Katara with a lightning bolt. Katara is forced to fight off a mentally unstable Azula. Meanwhile, Aang is ready to face Ozai for the fate of the world, but Aang can't bring himself to stop the Phoenix King and he is overwhelmed by Ozai's attacks. Sokka, Toph, and Suki try to stop the Fire Nation airships from destroying the Earth Kingdom. The Order of the White Lotus starts liberating Ba Sing Se in hopes of freeing everyone from the Fire Nation.—dawsonpersi
